Reviews.Title: quick - easy - fast
Reviews.Author: rsinmetal
Reviews.Content: After being sent here by the manufacturer to order a replacement remotefor my F150. Order process was quick and easy, the remote came very quickly as promised. Thank you

Reviews.Title: Easier than expected...
Reviews.Author: G--
Reviews.Content: Not much to say but easier to sync than expected, works the same as OEM.

Reviews.Title: They workegreat and were easy to program too.
Reviews.Author: Kevin Pickell "KPexEA"
Reviews.Content: My wife's 2005 Suzuki Aerio had a Clifford alarm installed back when it was new and the original remote buttons have finally worn out. These replacements worked perfectly and were programmed in only a few minutes.

Reviews.Title: Buy this and SAVE
Reviews.Author: Pamela Dooley "Pam Dooley"
Reviews.Content: It works great and cost about 1/2 of what the dealership wanted to charge me. I'm thinking about buying another one just in case one of us loses our keys again.

Reviews.Title: Remote
Reviews.Author: Mark E Bauer
Reviews.Content: I was happy with the service from the vendor. As far as themanufacture goes I would not rercommend their product because this is the third time I have had to purchase new remotes. the plastic breaks and the electronics inside wear out much to fast. I am a careful person so it is not because of recless behavior. If you want to take the chance of being stranded somewhere because of alarm failure then by all means purchase a avital alarm system.

Reviews.Title: Useless
Reviews.Author: Mahesh_N
Reviews.Content: This remote is useless. I went to the Nissan dealer, even they were unable to program this remote. I tried everything which websites suggested, did not help.

Reviews.Title: Did not work
Reviews.Author: C. Price
Reviews.Content: When attempting to program, it would start the car but would not open the doors, and it would not shut the car off.  It was defective and I sent it back.

Reviews.Title: same as original remote
Reviews.Author: Tom Metro "entrepreneur"
Reviews.Content: This is a replacement remote made by the original manufacturer, so it works identically to the original when new. No problems.

Reviews.Title: Easy Instructions
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: After searching locally I was told it would be cheaper to install a new unit instead of ordering a new key fob.  I was very impressed by the fact that the instructions were easy to understand, made the programming of the remote very easy.  Works great, and I didn't need to purchase a new auto start for my car.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Alex J
Reviews.Content: This remote was easy to program and works perfectly. Got it for a great price-most places wanted 70$ or more plus they wanted to charge me to program it.

Reviews.Title: aVITAL rEMOTE
Reviews.Author: Steven E. Moehr
Reviews.Content: Comparative pricing has found Amazon 1/2 the price of other web sites. Works excellent, o problems!
